summary: Mr Beast set up a challenge where 100 boys and 100 girls competed in separate circles to win $500,000 by maintaining the most participants after 100 hours. Various strategies, distractions, prizes, and temptations influenced the outcomes as both teams endeavored to endure the physical and mental strain of the competition. Ultimately, after 100 hours, 35 girls and 33 boys remained, with the girls securing the prize.
